N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 7030.1 - Policy

State Regulations

Each local correctional facility shall employ policies
and procedures designed to ensure that prisoners are not subject to unlawful
discriminatory treatment in any facility decisionmaking process, including but
not limited to work assignment, classification, disciplinary or grievance
decisions or when being considered for any available facility program, including but not limited to educational, religious, vocational or temporary
release programs, based upon the race, religion, nationality, sex, sexual
orientation including homosexuality, age or political beliefs of such
prisoners. Notes
